repository.label: Repository

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Barber Family Papers, M0272, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Family papers including photographs, correspondence, legal and financial documents, diaries, maps, clippings, and ephemera. Subjects focus on family activities including life in Santa Barbara, California, trips to London and Cocos Island, and general family history.
